name: android
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a robot (= machine controlled by computer) that is made to look like a human Compare
humanoid noun

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Machines - general words
[ U ] an operating system (= set of controlling programs) used mainly for mobile devices (= phones and small computers) that you control by touching the screen: a modern smartphone running Android or iOS Android apps
[ C ] a brand name for a device (= phone or computer) that uses the Android operating system: You can download the app onto your Android.

Add to word list
a robot (= mechanical device) that looks like a person: He acted just like an android, avoiding any expression of feelings.
